title: Use a Thermal Mug to Also Keep Beverages Cold
description:
As the weather warms up, keep cold drinks cold by storing them in thermal mugs.

The OXO Stainless Steel Travel Mug does double duty, insulating hot drinks and keeping them hot or keeping cold drinks refreshingly chilled for hours with its double-walled cup and vacuum insulation

asset.author: OXO
asset.hookText:
As the weather warms up, keep cold drinks cold by storing them in thermal mugs.

The OXO Stainless Steel Travel Mug does double duty, insulating hot drinks and keeping them hot or keeping cold drinks refreshingly chilled for hours with its double-walled cup and vacuum insulation: http://bit.ly/freKir
